name: decrypt Base64 strings back to plaintext
description: Keys stay plaintext. Base64 values are decoded back to plaintext.

name: decrypt nested objects (restore structure)
description: Keys stay plaintext. Base64 encoded JSON objects are decoded and parsed back to objects.

name: decrypt mixed encoded and plain values
description: Keys stay plaintext. Only valid Base64 values are decoded. Non-Base64 strings stay unchanged.

name: decrypt booleans (restore type)
description: Keys stay plaintext. Base64 encoded boolean strings are decoded and converted back to booleans.

name: decrypt null values (restore type)
description: Keys stay plaintext. Base64 encoded 'null' string is decoded and converted back to null.

name: decrypt numbers (restore type)
description: Keys stay plaintext. Base64 encoded number strings are decoded and converted back to numbers.

name: decrypt arrays (restore structure)
description: Keys stay plaintext. Base64 encoded JSON arrays are decoded and parsed back to arrays.

name: handle empty objects
description: Empty objects have no keys or values to process.

name: decrypt complex nested structure (round-trip)
description: Keys stay plaintext throughout. Complex nested objects are encrypted and decrypted maintaining structure.

name: handle corrupted Base64 gracefully
description: If decryption fails (defensive error handling), the original value is kept unchanged. This ensures graceful degradation when a value that looks encrypted is actually corrupted.
